verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Make me a servant, humble and meek
Lord let me lift up those who are weak
And may the prayer of my heart always be
Make me a servant, make me a servant
Make me a servant today

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Make us your servants, humble and meek
Lord let us lift up those who are weak
And may the prayer of our hearts aslways be
Make us your servants, make us your servants
Make us your servants today
